Reviews.Content: stayed recently found real dump suite stayed 2 nights water radiator kept dripping called front desk sent maid wrapped towel pipe taped cloth carpet dry primitive dripped 2 days suite tenement atmosphere eventually heater broke front desk brought heater plug move suite smelled horses stable moved close pub noise music loud pulsating floor renovating tiles mess walk boards tiles plaster safety hazard stunk body odor plus bathroom tired night luckily spray helped stayed pungent smell sulphur coming bathrrom drains maids surly belligerent times sounded hen fight courtyard forth offer continental breakfast 7 overpriced served woman speak english coffee gross food stale avoid future pay bit
